name: Validate Next available actions for "Mark As Renewable" Transaction

testSteps.description: And underwriter is on home page
And Underwriter selects mark as non renewal transaction on policy
And with non renew reason 'Agent of Record' and click on save and continue
When underwriter selects book on mark as non renewal transaction
Then policy status displayed as 'In Force (Non-Renewed)'
Given underwriter selects mark as renewal transaction on policy
And transaction effective date same as policy effective date and click on save and continue
When underwriter selects book on mark as renewable transaction
Then policy status should be 'In Force' for mark as renewal

And below Actions should be displayed
| Cancellation |
| Change Name and Address |
| Final Audit |
| Audit Non Compliance |
| Quote for Endorsement |
| Endorse |
| Conditional Renewal |
| Reverse Endorsement |
| Inquire |
| Quote for Renewal |
| Extract |
| Extract All |
| Extract As Is |
| Extract All As Is |
| Mark As Non-Renewable |
| Pending Cancellation |
